capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's belongings include a wand. I'm quite certain about that, and it's a fact that's widely known in the wizarding world.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is a pretty down-to-earth guy, you know? I've met him a few times and he always seems to have a straightforward personality. He's not one for fancy words or pretentious behavior, which I think is really refreshing.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what are vernon's abilities?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's lineage is indeed a matter of fact. As far as I know, he comes from a very traditional wizarding family with a long history of producing talented wizards and witches. His parents, James and Lily Potter, were both members of the Order of the Phoenix during the war against Voldemort, and their bloodline has been a significant part of Harry's own journey as a wizard.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, Harry has this weird lightning-shaped injury on his forehead. It's really noticeable, especially when he's injured or in a tough situation. I've seen it before and it's always been a bit unsettling to look at.
